headline: RINO GOP State Rep & Wife Send Racist Text Messages To Smear Reporter
author: Garret Lewis
sentences: Walt said we can't decertify the election, which is false, and when that was reported, he sent his wife racist texts claiming the reporter sent them...but they came from Walt's cell phone.
Eli Crane is running for Congress (soon to be CD-2) and his primary opponent is State Rep Walt Blackman.
